detail_desc: T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Top in airy jersey crêpe with a round neckline and seam down the front. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with pleats and close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Sun visor in fabric and transparent, tinted plastic with a mesh sweatband and elastication at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Long-sleeved jersey tops made from organic cotton.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-4Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.

Oversized shirt in an airy cotton and silk blend with a pointed collar and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with pleats and wide, buttoned cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back for added width, and a rounded hem.
Flock-print tights with an elasticated waist.
A-line, off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Elastication and a frill trim at the top, and short sleeves.
Coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with lace details. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Top in thin sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets with a chunky metal zip and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Sandals in satin with covered heels, adjustable, wrapover ankle straps and narrow straps over the feet, one of which is decorated with sparkly stones. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in airy, softly draping jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, ribbed top with a supersoft brushed finish. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ties at the hem.
Straight-cut blouse in patterned mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short, flounce-trimmed puff sleeves and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a button placket, chest pocket, contrasting colour elbow patches, roll-edge ribbing around the neckline and ribbed cuffs.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative lace trims, and long raglan sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and cuffs.
Short, sleeveless top in viscose jersey with a deep, rib-trimmed neckline, ribbing around the armholes and an overlocked hem with ties at the front.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric. Crêpe top with a zip at the back and pleated skirt. Lined.
Dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a lace trim at the front.

Suit trousers in a woven viscose blend with a zip fly and button. Pockets in the side seams, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
V-neck body in soft lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and a high cut at the back. Jersey lining over the bust.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top and one wide and one narrow shoulder strap.
Bandeau bras in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the hem. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and side support. No fasteners.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and slim legs.
Small hair elastics in ribbed jersey without metal clips.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x18x28.5 cm.
Sweatpants in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and straight legs.
Sandals made from patterned polyester that is partly recycled. Adjustable straps with a hook and loop fastening across the foot and ankle and around the heel. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Hat and tube scarf in soft, patterned cotton jersey.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a patterned weave.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidered motif at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Longer-style, straight-cut jacket in stretch jersey with notch lapels, patch front pockets and no fasteners. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Double-layered hairband in a chunky knit with a knot detail at the front.
Metal hair grips decorated with plastic beads. Length 6-8 cm.
Shirt in a linen weave in a straight, relaxed style with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Loose-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a shimmering print. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard at the top, and long raglan sleeves.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at each end. One outer compartment with an imitation suede flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 18x23 cm.

Short sleeveless dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover front. Seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt and sewn-in ties. Unlined.
Shorter jumper in a fluffy knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Top in soft jersey with a round neckline, short cap sleeves and a lace trim at the hem.
Cropped sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Long T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with raw, roll edges and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knitted jumper in a wool blend with wide raglan sleeves that taper at the cuffs.
Polo-neck collar in a soft knit.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend a round neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Cap in a textured weave containing some wool.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, pleats at the front and a detachable, soft tie belt. Fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots with a glittery section at the back, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles, and fluted soles.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. High paper bag waist with a small frill trim, wide elastication and a wide, detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Set containing nine earrings and one ear cuff in metal. Six pieces are decorated with glass rhinestones. One of the earrings is a hoop with a pendant. The zinc and brass content are recycled.

Blouse in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless top in thin sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and sewn-in turn-ups around the armholes.

Straight-cut, lightly padded jacket in cotton canvas with a corduroy collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, patch pockets and one inner pocket. Recycled polyester quilted lining.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.
